thread.section_title: Test Me DNA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Test Me DNA | testmedna.com
thread.title: Stephanie
thread.title_full: Test Me DNA reviewed by Stephanie

author: Stephanie
title: Stephanie
text: This is my second time using Test Me DNA. My alleged father wanted to make sure that I was his daughter. The staff is lovely. I called and they answered all my questions. I emailed questions as well, and they got back to me the same day. I also used their service to test my son and husband because my husband is dark and my son blue eyed light skin doesn't mean he's not his son. I loved their service both times ! I highly recommend them!
